protein.specific_function: Troponin T is the tropomyosin-binding subunit of troponin, the thin filament regulatory complex which confers calcium-sensitivity to striated muscle actomyosin ATPase activity

reference.reference_text: Mesnard L, Samson F, Espinasse I, Durand J, Neveux JY, Mercadier JJ: Molecular cloning and developmental expression of human cardiac troponin T. FEBS Lett. 1993 Aug 9;328(1-2):139-44.
